ing: 1 cup fresh basil leaves, or more to taste
1 scallion bulb, trimmed, or more to taste
salt and ground black pepper to taste
n: Pesto Pesto Sauce (Nut Free or Dairy Free)
des: "Delicious pesto sauce that can be made nut-free or dairy-free (if you omit the Parmesan cheese). Add more or less of your favorites to reach your desired consistency or taste. Use on pasta, pizza, as a dip, etc."
ins: Combine garlic scapes, basil, parsley, Parmesan cheese, scallion bulb, salt, and black pepper in a food processor; pulse to chop. Pour olive oil in slowly, with the processor running, until pesto sauce is smooth.
